long_description: With its enduring 3-panel design and rugged performance, the Timbuk2 Classic Messenger Bag in small stashes and protects your daily wares, whether bike riding or otherwise. Fully adjustable shoulder strap has a permanent, super comfortable air-mesh strap pad. Double-loop CAM buckle enables easy fit adjustment while getting rid of excess webbing. Corners fold in for excellent waterproofing. External front organizer has secure zipper closure; side-entry Napoleon zip pocket keeps quick-access items handy. Main compartment has a water bottle holder and organizer pockets to balance your load for comfort in carrying. Inner slash pocket fits a laptop up to 13 in. Made with Cordura(R) Endurance nylon fabric that is lighter in weight yet tougher in abrasion resistance and higher in water resistance than ballistic nylon. Waterproof lining helps keeps contents dry. Low-profile top grab handle; partiallly concealed buckles secure bottom of flap and have compression straps. Timbuk2 Classic Messenger Bag comes with a safety flasher attachment loop (flasher sold separately).
short_description: With its enduring 3-panel design and rugged performance, the Timbuk2 Classic Messenger Bag in small stashes and protects your daily wares, whether bike riding or otherwise.
